name: io.github.rishikavikondala/mcp-server-aws
description: A Model Context Protocol server implementation for AWS operations that currently supports S3 and DynamoDB services. All operations are automatically logged and can be accessed through the audit://aws-operations resource endpoint.

tools.name: s3_bucket_create
tools.description: Create a new S3 bucket

tools.name: s3_bucket_list
tools.description: List all S3 buckets

tools.name: s3_bucket_delete
tools.description: Delete an S3 bucket

tools.name: s3_object_upload
tools.description: Upload an object to S3

tools.name: s3_object_delete
tools.description: Delete an object from S3

tools.name: s3_object_list
tools.description: List objects in an S3 bucket

tools.name: s3_object_read
tools.description: Read an object's content from S3

tools.name: dynamodb_table_create
tools.description: Create a new DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_table_describe
tools.description: Get details about a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_table_delete
tools.description: Delete a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_table_update
tools.description: Update a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_item_put
tools.description: Put an item into a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_item_get
tools.description: Get an item from a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_item_update
tools.description: Update an item in a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_item_delete
tools.description: Delete an item from a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_item_query
tools.description: Query items in a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_item_scan
tools.description: Scan items in a DynamoDB table

tools.name: dynamodb_batch_get
tools.description: Batch get multiple items from DynamoDB tables

tools.name: dynamodb_item_batch_write
tools.description: Batch write operations (put/delete) for DynamoDB items

tools.name: dynamodb_batch_execute
tools.description: Execute multiple PartiQL statements in a batch

tools.name: dynamodb_describe_ttl
tools.description: Get the TTL settings for a table

tools.name: dynamodb_update_ttl
tools.description: Update the TTL settings for a table

resources.name: aws-operations
resources.description: Access to automatically logged AWS operations.
